title: RPT-Alibaba to invest additional $2 bln in Lazada, replaces CEO
text: March 19, 2018 / 3:39 AM / Updated 2 hours ago RPT-Alibaba to invest additional $2 bln in Lazada, replaces CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Repeats to attach to alerts) BEIJING, March 19 (Reuters) - Alibaba Group Holding Ltd said it will invest an additional $2 billion in Southeast Asian e-commerce firm Lazada Group as part of the Chinese firmâ€™s push into new markets. Following the investment, Lucy Peng, who currently serves as Lazada Group chairwoman, will take over the role of chief executive officer, replacing founder Max Bittner, who will become a senior advisor to Alibaba. Alibaba has previously invested $2 billion in the Singapore-based firm, bringing its total investment to $4 billion. (Reporting by Cate Cadell Editing by Stephen Coates)
